name: Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts
description: A roguelike adventure in a world of dungeons, filled with dangerous monsters. Your Main quest is to find the Seven Magic Artifacts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista , 7 or 10 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 1 GB available space
